prompts: Create a Psychic-type Pokemon that can manipulate time and space with its powers.
I want to see a mythical Pokemon with multiple arms and a mysterious aura.
Generate a unique design for a Pokemon that embodies dimensions and portals.
Make a colorful Pokemon that blends elements of magic and trickery.
Imagine a creature that can teleport, with a playful yet enigmatic personality.
Design a creature that has a mix of modern and ancient aesthetics.
Show me a creature that represents the concept of mischief in Pokemon.
